title: New SAM
content:
You should assign the Asset Management license to the tenant to access the new SAM capability. To retrieve host information from UCMDB, SAM also requires the Premium Discovery (UD Full) license.

The new SAM capability provides the following features:

  • SAM Home
  • Compliance
  • Analysis
  • Licenses
  • License models
  • License usage
  • License metrics
  • License rules
  • Products
  • Configurations

To view these menus, sign in to Service Management, and then choose Run > Software Asset.

Note that to access the SAM menus after you install and deploy SAM, you must have the required permissions. Out of the box, Service Management provides a Software manager role with all the privileges needed for using the SAM capability.

For more information about how to assign permissions to a role, see Roles.
